pageProduct.name: White Glo Flossers Tight Fit Mint 100 Pack
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

White Glo Tight Squeeze Floss Picks Mint gives a precise clean and floss, helping to reduce plaque build-up and tooth decay.

Precision Mint Floss
- Superior cleaning. Designed not to stretch, shed or break.

Easy Grip Handle
- Comfortable to hold for precise cleaning.

Toothpick
- Removes trapped food debris. Folds out for greater safety.

Regular use will help reduce plaque build up and risk of gingivitis. Use after each meal to remove food debris and reduce tooth decay.

Floss guaranteed not to break.

Dentist recommended.

Product Claims: Floss guaranteed not to break. Dentist recommended.

Recommended By: Dentist recommended.

Size: 100 Pack

Warnings

Adult supervision recommended under age 10.

Directions

Directions For Flossing:
Guide floss between your teeth. Gently slide floss into the space between the gum and the tooth, rubbing the floss gently and down, keeping it pressed against the tooth.

Directions For Fold-Out Toothpick:
Unfold pick and guide into space between teeth. Gently use in-and-out motion to clean teeth and stimulate gums.
